thread.title: BRIEF-Iron Mountain Reports Q4 FFO Per Share $0.53

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Iron Mountain Reports Q4 FFO Per Share $0.53
text: February 16, 2018 / 12:55 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Iron Mountain Reports Q4 FFO Per Share $0.53 Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Iron Mountain Inc: * IRON MOUNTAIN REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $991 MILLION VERSUS $934 MILLION * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.53 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.58 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * IRON MOUNTAIN SEES 2018 REVENUE C$4,160 MILLION - C$4,260 MILLION * IRON MOUNTAIN SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$1.00 - C$1.20 * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $3.97 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.35 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO $154 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
